concept.title: 245.103-72 Government-furnished property attachments to solicitations and awards.

conbody.p: When performance will require the use of GFP, contracting officers shall include the GFP attachment to solicitations and awards. See PGI for links to the formats and procedures for preparing the GFP attachment.
